snippet: For a team that was batting only .207 entering Monday night’s game against the Diamondbacks, the Mets might have been considered fortunate to be 5-7.
abstract: New York Mets 5-7 record is better than their on-field performance to start the 2014 season.
lead_paragraph: For a team that was batting only .207 entering Monday night’s game against the Diamondbacks, the Mets might have been considered fortunate to be 5-7.

headline.main: Mets’ Record Is Better Than Play Has Been
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Record Is Better Than Play Has Been
